sentences.english: The best of America's skaters beamed for the camera.
sentences.chinese: 最佳美国的溜冰者为照相机放光了。

sentences.english: GLO started the sponsorship of the Confederation of African Football African Player of the Year Award.

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo obtain the best extraction process of Xiaocuoyin.
sentences.chinese: 目的优选消痤饮的最佳提取工艺。

sentences.english: Result Determin the best prescription approach and prepare the samples.
sentences.chinese: 结果确定处方最佳工艺并制备样品。

sentences.english: Carlo Ancelotti's side doesn't look to be in top form.
sentences.chinese: 安切落蒂的队伍看起来不在最佳状态。

sentences.english: They say the best sauce is company.
sentences.chinese: 人们说高朋满座是最佳的佐料。

sentences.english: That may be the best wayto incorporate your hobby into your career.
sentences.chinese: 这可能是将你的兴趣融合到工作中的最佳方式了。

sentences.english: Here is the best system for note-taking and studying I've discovered so far.
sentences.chinese: 这里有一种最佳的听课记笔记学习系统，据我所知。

sentences.english: During 2 years observation and came to the conclusion that the best training method was branch bending method.
sentences.chinese: 经两年调查结果，三种方法中以屈株法效果最佳。

sentences.english: The advanced beginner uses best practices.
This small window of consciousness was renowned as the best time for boning.
sentences.chinese: 这种1小时的有意识状态被认为是最佳的适应时间。

sentences.english: To definite the optimum experimental condition for microwave extraction red pigment of Baubinia blakeana Dunn flower .
sentences.chinese: 确定微波萃取红花羊蹄甲花红色素的最佳试验条件。

sentences.english: Psyllium offers benefits in patients with irritable bowel syndrome in primary care.
sentences.chinese: 欧车前在肠易激综合征患者的初级保健中疗效最佳。

sentences.english: The top city in Asia is Singapore, at no. 26.
sentences.chinese: 新加坡作为亚洲最佳城市，排名26。

sentences.english: Fett was one of the best Star Wars character.
sentences.chinese: 我一直以为波巴费特是最佳的星球大战人物之一。

definition: best/(you) had better (do what we suggest)
first choice/premium/to come first in the imperial examinations
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
to select on the basis of a vote or consensus
